attributes.additional_details: As a valued individual of the UK population, I believe that an annual 'National Sausage Butty Day' on 20th of January would be highly beneficial to all residents of the UK. Not only will members of society all congregate to enjoy a good old sausage bun with family and friends but it will also benefit local farmers as their produce will only be used to ensure the best sausage buns possible with the best ingredients.
